author: TRAIN
title: PoolPeek.com Upgrades
description: PoolPeek.com is built by small pool owners for small pool delegators. Small stake pools need more ways for delegators to find their pools.

assessments.note: Proposal is good, but is in the wrong category.
It's not clear how this addresses the challenge to further the developer ecosystem at all.

The proposal's focus is to promote the dissemination of smaller pools, which is in line with Cardano's decentralization mission, but this proposal doesn't demonstrate how it will address the challenge, as the focus of the challenge is on developers.
This proposal does not address enhancing and growing the developer ecosystem, but instead focuses adding capabiities to a specific website.
The funds are to continue adding functionality to an already working application and system, the risk is minimal.
Beyond the relevant experience section there is no further info provided on the team. No project plan/budget included either.

I do not see clearly how the proposal will significantly promote small pools, the creation of an alternative pool explorer alone doesn't guarantee success, I think it is important that the strategy is more detailed. Furthermore, as the proposal doesn't address the challenge, I believe that the plan presented becomes less relevant. The team's experience seems reasonable to the idea presented and the project is already under development, which shows commitment.
Although the team is experienced in its domain, the proposal does not define KPIs relevant to the developer ecosystem.
There is more than enough proof of experience.
It's never made clear what the aims of this proposal are or how they address the challenge in any meaningful way.

The proposal description doesn't show how it will address the challenge, as the focus of the proposal is on SPOs and delegators and not on developers. No roadmap, milestones, KPIs and budget details were presented. I recommend the inclusion of these details and that the proposal be submitted to a more appropriate challenge.
The proposal does not provide sufficient information to assess the reasonableness of the budget. It does not provide a roadmap.

solution: offer additional views where delegators can see small pools in interesting ways, add a chatbot, create a new cardano token viewer website.
